settings.hideNightVisionEffectTimer: Hide the Night Vision Effect Timer
settings.showBackpackPreviewInAH: Show Backpack Preview for Your Items While AH is Open
settings.skyblockAddonsButtonInPauseMenu: 일시 정지 화면에서 스카이블럭 에드온 버튼 보기
settings.turnBowGreenWhenUsingToxicArrowPoison: Color Bow Green When Using Toxic Arrow Poison
settings.baitListDisplay: Show Bait List While Holding a Rod
settings.rotateMap: Rotate Map to Your Player's Rotation
settings.centerRotationOnYourPlayer: Center the Rotation Around Your Player
settings.baseStatBoostPercentage: Show Base Stat Boost for Dungeon Items
settings.showPlayerHeadsOnMap: Show Player Heads on Dungeon Map

messages.labymod: LabyMod 유저들에게: 배고픔, 갑옷, 체력 바 숨기기는 LabyMod와 호환되지 않습니다.
messages.minionCannotReach: %type% 미니언과 몹의 거리가 멀어 생산을 중지했습니다!
messages.minionIsFull: 당신의 미니언의 수납 공간이 꽉 찼습니다!

update.majorAvailable: 새로운 업데이트 ( % version %) 가 제공됩니다! 다운로드 링크는 채팅에서 찾을수 있습니다.
update.patchAvailable: 새로운 패치 업데이트 ( % version %) 가 제공됩니다! 채팅에서 다운로드 옵션을 찾으십시오!

messages.cancelledStemBreak: SkyblockAddons이 이 줄기를 부수는 것을 방지했습니다. 정말로 부수려면, 빈 손으로 부수세요.
messages.cancelledProfileOpening: SkyblockAddons이 활을 든 채 이 플레이어의 프로필을 여는 것을 방지했습니다.
messages.cancelledDropping: SkyblockAddons이 이 희귀한 아이템 또는 도구를 핫바에서 떨어뜨리는 것을 방지했습니다.
messages.clickMoreTimes: 정말 이 아이템을 떨어뜨리려면 %times%번 더 떨어뜨리세요.
messages.clickOneMoreTime: Click/drop this item 1 more time if you really want to do this.
messages.cancelledDeepCaverns: SkyblockAddons 기능으로 인해이 블록을 채굴하지 못했습니다.
messages.switchedSlots: You have just switched from a locked slot or rare item. Please wait a bit before dropping!
messages.clickToOpenFolder: Click to open your mods folder!
messages.firstStatus: This status will appear at the top
messages.secondStatus: This status will appear under your first status
messages.fallbackStatus: This status will appear when your automatic status has nothing to show
messages.cancelledPark: A feature has stopped you from breaking this block here.
messages.bossApproaching: You are close to spawning a boss!

discordStatus.descriptionPurse: Shows the amount of coins in your purse
discordStatus.descriptionStats: Shows your HP, Defense and Mana stats
discordStatus.descriptionItem: Shows the name of the item you're holding
discordStatus.descriptionTime: Shows the current Skyblock time. E.g. 12:00am 1st Early Winter
discordStatus.descriptionAuto: Automatically displays a status. E.g. your zealot count while in the end.
discordStatus.descriptionRevenants: Shows that you are doing a Revenant quest.
discordStatus.descriptionSvens: Shows that you are doing a Sven quest.
discordStatus.descriptionTarantula: Shows that you are doing a Tarantula quest.

commandUsage.sba.copyEntity: §e(Dev) §7Copy NBT data for entities of the given name(s) within the given radius around the player
commandUsage.sba.dev.enabled: Developer mode enabled! TIP: Press "%keyName%" to copy NBT data!
commandUsage.sba.folder.error: 모드 폴더를 여는 도중 오류가 발생하였습니다: %s
commandUsage.sba.help: Show this help message. If a command is provided, detailed help about that command is shown.
commandUsage.sba.help.copyEntity: Copies the NBT data of entities. The types of entities included and the radius around the player to copy data from can be customized. If no options are given, the default settings are used. The default settings are: include players, armor stands, and mobs, and a radius of %radius% blocks. If the radius isn't given, the default radius is used.
commandUsage.sba.help.copyEntity.entityNames: Names of the types of entities you want to copy data for (e.g. Player, Creeper). Press "Tab" after typing the command for a full list. Separate multiple names with commas, names are case-sensitive.
commandUsage.sba.help.copyEntity.radius: The radius(in blocks) around the player to copy entity NBT data from
commandUsage.sba.help.copySidebar.formatted: 복사할 때 포맷팅 코드들이 포함되어야 하는지 결정합니다. "참" 혹은 "거짓" 이 될 수 있고, 만약에 아무런 값을 입력받지 않았다면 기본값인 "거짓" 이 됩니다. "참" 일때 포맷팅 코드들이 복사됩니다.
commandUsage.sba.help.dev: This command toggles developer mode. This mode is meant for developers Skyblock mods/tools. It provides raw data from the game such as entity and item NBT.
commandUsage.sba.help.help.command: the sub-command to get detailed usage for
commandUsage.sba.help.set.zealotCounter: Manually sets counts in the zealot counter.
commandUsage.sba.help.set.zealotCounter.zealots: Zealots killed since the last summoning eye drop
